text: Mengkofen is a municipality in the district of Dingolfing-Landau in Bavaria in Germany. It is in the Aiterach River valley. ==Subdivision== The municipality includes 10 former municipalities (Gemarkungen), and other villages: Infos at municipal website *Hofdorf *Hüttenkofen *Martinsbuch *Mengkofen *Mühlhausen *Puchhausen *Süßkofen **Ginhart **Hagenau *Tunding *Tunzenberg *Weichshofen ==References== Category:Dingolfing-Landau
title: Mengkofen
